HAMMR

HAMMR_SupportMethods module¶

HAMMR_SupportMethods.CopyFileToLocation(source_path, destination_path)[source]¶
Description:

Copies a singular file to a new location.

Args:

source_path (string): Path to the file you wish to copy. destination_path (string): Path to the location you want you copy to be made.

Returns:

None

HAMMR_SupportMethods.GetAllFilesRelatedToMethod(input_file)[source]¶
Description:

Searches the given input_files location for files that share the same name but different types

Args:

input_file (string): File path to the .HSL file for a method

Returns:

_relatedFiles (list[string]): A list of file paths that share the same name but different type as input_file.

HAMMR_SupportMethods.GetFoldersInDir(directoryPath)[source]¶
Description:

Helper function to grab all available folders within a location excluding the .git folder.

Args:

directoryPath (string): The path of the directory to search.

Returns:

folderNames (list[string]): A list of strings of the names of each folder found.

HAMMR_SupportMethods.GetHSLFileInDeploymentLocation(FilesToMove, folder)[source]¶
Description:

WARnING: Combination of both CopyFileToLocation and SetMethodLayoutToLocalLayout :WARNING Creates a destination location depending on given folder and copies all files in FilesToMove to this location along with setting the layout of the .HSL file to that destinations version.

Args:

FilesToMove (List[string]): A list of file paths to be copied to a location. The FilesToMove[0] must be the .HSL file. folder (string): The Hamilton Robot repo folder location (EX: “Ham-08 Mothra”).

Returns:

forcheck (string): A filepath to the newly created and edited .HSL file.

HAMMR_SupportMethods.SetMethodLayoutToLocalLayout(input_file, LayoutFolder)[source]¶
Description:

Converts the .HSL reference for both .Lay and .Res to the version in the given layout folder

Args:

input_file (string): What .HSL file to convert LayoutFolder (string): The name of the hamilton robot folder the new layout .Lay and .Res file exist (NOT the PATH, EX: “Ham-08 Mothra”)

Returns:

None

HAMMR_SupportMethods.SetMethodLibrariesToLocalVersion(input_file)[source]¶
Description:

Converts the given .HSL file’s library include references from current to the standard location on Hamilton install (C:Program Files (x86)HAMILTONLibrary)

Args:

input_file (string): A file path to a .HSL file

Returns:

None

HAMMR_SupportMethods.SetMethodLibrariesToRepoVersion(input_file)[source]¶
Description:

Converts the given .HSL file’s library include references from current to the Repo specific location (C:Program Files (x86)HAMILTONRepoProDevHamiltonMain DevelopmentLibrary)

Args:

input_file (string): A file path to a .HSL file

Returns:

None
